<a name="SLogger"></a>
## type [SLogger](<https://github.com/blueprint-uservices/blueprint/blob/main/runtime/plugins/slogger/log.go#L12>)

SLogger implements the backend.Logger interface by wrapping calls to golang's slog package.

```go
type SLogger struct{}
```
